name: THE EDITOR
description:
"In 1996, a congressman was murdered...
The prime suspect is a congressman's aide.
As the suspicious article was published
the story begins"

Assume the role of Chief Editor at a newspaper company
As the Chief Editor, you are responsible for writing the daily front-page article.
Decide your approach and choose a headline.
Edit photos to match the title.

Your edits will change the course of the outcome
How you decide to edit the articles will determine the fate
of those held accountable for the murder of the assemblyman.

Become the greatest newspaper
Your newspaper's credibility, number of sales, and autonomy are all on the line when you publish an article.
